name: SINNERS (itch) (La Fígara Negra)
description:
WHO IS SINNERMAN?

Is he a soul condemned for his sins? Or just a madman with hallucinations? Maybe the victim of a cruel experiment?
To find out, you will have to get his memories back by making your way through scenes taken from the worst nightmares imaginable, which will take you to one of several possible endings.

  • Slow-Paced Arcade Gameplay.
  •  2-Players Local Co-Op.
  • Unlockable weapons, skills and abilities.
  • Hidden secrets and mysterious objects to add to your inventory.
  • Huge map with secret areas and multiple routes.
  • Variety of enemies and scary bosses.
  • Multiple Endings.
  • Sinister CutScenes.

If you played Ghouls ‘n Ghosts this will be familiar.

Wrong way!
